label: Hagino, Wataru & Satoshi Shimano.  2017. One new species of the subgenus Cosmogalumna (Acari: Oribatida: Galumnidae: Galumna) from Japan with supplementary description of Galumna (Cosmogalumna) ornata Aoki, 1988. Acarologia 57(4): 765–777.
